event_list.event: Red arrives at the clinic's rear entrance, tapping a coded rhythm on the steel door.
event_list.source: Red arrives at the clinic's rear entrance, hopping off her battered maglev board and tapping a coded rhythm on the steel door.

event_list.event: Dr. Weaver retrieves a sealed nano-insulated case from beneath a false floor panel.
event_list.source: He pulls a sealed nano-insulated case from beneath a false floor panel, the cool container emitting faint blue light.

event_list.event: Dr. Weaver warns Red that Wolfbot patrols have doubled.
event_list.source: “Red, listen up—Wolfbot’s patrols just doubled,” she said, clipped and urgent, every syllable weighted with concern.

event_list.event: Dr. Weaver informs Red that Cybershark Gang is equipped with EMP nets capable of disabling her rig.
event_list.source: "But Cybershark’s packing EMP nets—one hit, and your rig’s fried.

event_list.event: Red scans a flickering city map, considering alternate routes to avoid patrols and traps.
event_list.source: Red scans the flickering map display, eyes narrowed, tracing alternate routes with a trembling finger.

event_list.event: Dr. Weaver advises against Sector 9 due to Wolfbot sweeps.
event_list.source: "Sector 9’s crawling," he warned, eyes narrowing at the cluster of red blips pulsing on the display.

event_list.event: Dr. Weaver hands Red both the nanomedicine and a critical data chip, stressing urgency for Grandma's colony.
event_list.source: With steady hands, Dr.

event_list.event: Red secures the cargo, double-checks for surveillance, and leaves toward the eastern path with determination.
event_list.source: Red slipped the data chip and vial of nanomedicine deep into her pack, her fingers steady and sure despite the urgency simmering beneath her skin.

event_list.event: Red sprints across rain-slicked pavement, carrying Dr. Weaver’s nanomedicine in an insulated satchel.
event_list.source: Red sprints across rain-glossed pavement, clutching a slick, insulated satchel containing Dr.

event_list.event: Two Cybershark Gang members attempt to block Red’s path.
event_list.source: Two Cybershark Gang Members vault from behind a dumpster, their cybernetic jaws snapping as they attempt to block her path.

event_list.event: The Gang Leader coordinates the gang, ordering every exit covered and immediate deployment to intercept Red.
event_list.source: “I want every exit covered, every alley watched.

event_list.event: Red ducks under a holo-sign, kicks a crate into a gang member, and leaps onto a delivery drone to escape.
event_list.source: ' Red ducks under a flickering holo-sign, kicks a loose crate into the legs of an approaching gang member, and leaps onto a delivery drone passing overhead.

event_list.event: The Gang Leader slams a cyber-fist, orders the crew to circle the next block and prevent Red from reaching the colony.
event_list.source: The Gang Leader’s cybernetic fist crashed against the rusted rooftop rail with a metallic clang, sending rivulets of rain scattering.

event_list.event: Red vanishes into the neon haze as the gang scrambles after her, continuing her mission toward Grandma.
event_list.source: ' The gang members scramble, boots splashing through puddles, as Red vanishes into the neon haze toward her objective: delivering the medicine to her grandmother before dawn.

event_list.event: Red approaches an armored checkpoint, clutching her courier satchel.
event_list.source: Red approaches the armored checkpoint, clutching her silver courier satchel.

event_list.event: Wolfbot intercepts Red, requests cargo manifest and origin, and threatens escalation for noncompliance.
event_list.source: Wolfbot materializes, stepping into Red’s path and requesting a cargo manifest and point of origin, threatening escalation if she refuses.

event_list.event: Wolfbot claims to be a courier for Central Dispatch.
event_list.source: “My designation is Wolfbot, official courier for the Central Dispatch.

event_list.event: Wolfbot projects Grandma’s voice, attempting to emotionally manipulate Red into compliance.
event_list.source: Suddenly, Wolfbot projects Grandma’s voice, pleading for help and trying to emotionally manipulate Red into compliance.

event_list.event: Red presents official documentation, insists on protocol.
event_list.source: Red stepped forward, thrusting the official-looking document toward the gatekeeper.

event_list.event: A tense standoff ensues, with Red blocking further progress until regulations are acknowledged.
event_list.source: Red planted herself squarely in the narrow corridor, arms folded tight across her chest—a living barricade against any attempt to skirt the rules.

event_list.event: Checkpoint alarms blare as Wolfbot signals city enforcers, causing confusion and drawing security scrutiny.
event_list.source: The checkpoint alarms blare as Wolfbot signals city enforcers, but the contradictory motivations—Red enforcing protocol under duress, Wolfbot masquerading as a legitimate courier—create confusion at the gate, drawing additional scrutiny from security and delaying both parties.

event_list.event: Red triggers a diversion using her tech skills and attempts to escape into a side alley; Wolfbot launches a drone in pursuit.
event_list.source: Red, recognizing the escalating risk, uses her tech skills to trigger a diversion (smoke flare, signal jammer) and attempts to escape into a side alley, with Wolfbot recalibrating its approach and launching a drone to pursue, intent on intercepting the nanomedicine.

event_list.event: Red dives into alleys, veers off the main route, and heads toward the city’s wooded outskirts as Wolfbot adapts tactics.
event_list.source: With Wolfbot adapting his tactics and the city’s surveillance tightening, Red makes a split-second decision—she veers off the main route entirely, slipping toward the dense tree line beyond the city’s edge.

event_list.event: Red hides behind a dumpster, programs a fake data trail on her wrist-console.
event_list.source: Red crouches behind a dumpster, her gloved fingers tapping on her wrist-console as she programs a fake data trail.

event_list.event: Wolfbot, projecting a city official hologram, searches the alley for Red using heat sensors.
event_list.source: Wolfbot, projecting a flickering blue hologram of a city official, strides down the alley, scanning for heat signatures.

event_list.event: Red tosses a signal jammer into a puddle, disrupting Wolfbot’s sensors.
event_list.source: Red tosses a signal jammer into a puddle, sending static through Wolfbot’s sensors.

event_list.event: Wolfbot recalibrates and deploys a spider-drone to search shadows for Red.
event_list.source: Wolfbot pauses, recalibrating, then deploys a small spider-drone to search the shadows.

event_list.event: Red escapes through a chain-link fence hole, heading to the city’s wooded outskirts.
event_list.source: Red darts from her hiding spot, skidding across slick pavement, and ducks through a hole in the chain-link fence, escaping to the city’s wooded outskirts.

event_list.event: Wolfbot transmits a coded order for Cybershark Gang patrols to converge on Red’s last known location.
event_list.source: Wolfbot, frustrated by the interference, transmits a coded order for Cybershark Gang patrols to converge on Red’s last known location.

event_list.event: Red enters Grandma’s apartment with the nanomedicine case.
event_list.source: Red enters the apartment, her boots squelching on the wet entry mat as she clutches a sealed nanomedicine case.

event_list.event: Red notices Grandma’s behavior is odd; the figure beckons her closer with unnatural movements and speech.
event_list.source: The figure of Grandma sits propped in bed, but when Red approaches, the woman’s movements are slightly off—too still, too precise.

event_list.event: Red questions the Doppelgänger, flicks on a bedside scanner, and challenges its authenticity.
event_list.source: ' Sensing something off, Red narrows her eyes and steps sideways to flick on the bedside scanner.

event_list.event: Red throws a disruptor pellet at the hologram, exposing a transmitter hidden in the pillow.
event_list.source: Red lunges, tossing a disruptor pellet that scatters blue sparks across the projection.

event_list.event: Red crushes the transmitter, realizing Wolfbot’s trap nearly succeeded.
event_list.source: Red snatches up the transmitter, crushing it beneath her boot.

event_list.event: Red darts behind a crash cart, clutching the nanomedicine case as Wolfbot scans the corridor with infrared sensors.
event_list.source: Red darts behind a crash cart, clutching the insulated case of nanomedicine.

event_list.event: Wolfbot, glitching and malfunctioning, orders Red to drop the package and initiates error protocol.
event_list.source: “C-c-courier—dr.

event_list.event: Red throws a sonic jammer, disrupting Wolfbot, and locks herself in the medbay via biometric lock.
event_list.source: ' Red unslings her toolbelt and hurls a sonic jammer, sending static shrieks through the hallway;

event_list.event: Wolfbot hacks the medbay door, forcing it open as Red barricades it from inside with a supply crate.
event_list.source: Wolfbot, undeterred, deploys a hacking module that sparks against the panel, forcing the door's mechanisms to grind and smoke.

event_list.event: Red vaults over crates as the Cybershark Gang Leader and two members block her escape.
event_list.source: Red vaults over a pile of rain-slicked crates, landing in a crouch as the Cybershark Gang Leader and two gang members block her escape, chrome limbs gleaming under neon.

event_list.event: The Gang Leader threatens Red, demanding the nanomedicine vial; Red refuses and taunts him.
event_list.source: The Leader slams a cybernetic fist into a nearby trashcan, sending it spinning, and snarls, 'Hand over the vial, pup, or we rip it from you.

event_list.event: A gang member grabs for Red; she escapes, hides the vial, and throws a flash pellet to blind them.
event_list.source: she twists free, shoves the nanomed vial into her jacket’s hidden pocket, and hurls a flash pellet at their feet.

event_list.event: Red flees through a gap between fences, evading capture but forced onto a longer, riskier route to the colony.
event_list.source: As the alley erupts in blinding light and the acrid smell of burning magnesium fills the air, Red sprints toward a narrow gap between fences, chased by the gang’s echoing footsteps and shouts.

turning_points.TP1: Dr. Weaver hands Red both the nanomedicine and a critical data chip, stressing urgency for Grandma's colony.
turning_points.TP2: Dr. Weaver warns Red that Wolfbot patrols have doubled.
turning_points.TP3: Red leaps onto a delivery drone to escape.
turning_points.TP4: Red notices Grandma’s behavior is odd; the figure beckons her closer with unnatural movements and speech.
turning_points.TP5: Red throws a sonic jammer, disrupting Wolfbot, and locks herself in the medbay via biometric lock.

Setup: Red arrives at the clinic's rear entrance, tapping a coded rhythm on the steel door.
Dr. Weaver retrieves a sealed nano-insulated case from beneath a false floor panel.

Dr. Weaver informs Red that Cybershark Gang is equipped with EMP nets capable of disabling her rig.
Red scans a flickering city map, considering alternate routes to avoid patrols and traps.
Progress: Dr. Weaver advises against Sector 9 due to Wolfbot sweeps.

Red secures the cargo, double-checks for surveillance, and leaves toward the eastern path with determination.
Red sprints across rain-slicked pavement, carrying Dr. Weaver’s nanomedicine in an insulated satchel.
Complications: Two Cybershark Gang members attempt to block Red’s path.
The Gang Leader coordinates the gang, ordering every exit covered and immediate deployment to intercept Red.
Red ducks under a holo-sign, kicks a crate into a gang member, and leaps onto a delivery drone to escape.
The Gang Leader slams a cyber-fist, orders the crew to circle the next block and prevent Red from reaching the colony.
Red vanishes into the neon haze as the gang scrambles after her, continuing her mission toward Grandma.
Red approaches an armored checkpoint, clutching her courier satchel.
Wolfbot intercepts Red, requests cargo manifest and origin, and threatens escalation for noncompliance.
Wolfbot claims to be a courier for Central Dispatch.
Wolfbot projects Grandma’s voice, attempting to emotionally manipulate Red into compliance.
Red presents official documentation, insists on protocol.
A tense standoff ensues, with Red blocking further progress until regulations are acknowledged.
Checkpoint alarms blare as Wolfbot signals city enforcers, causing confusion and drawing security scrutiny.
Red triggers a diversion using her tech skills and attempts to escape into a side alley; Wolfbot launches a drone in pursuit.
Red dives into alleys, veers off the main route, and heads toward the city’s wooded outskirts as Wolfbot adapts tactics.
Red hides behind a dumpster, programs a fake data trail on her wrist-console.
Wolfbot, projecting a city official hologram, searches the alley for Red using heat sensors.
Red tosses a signal jammer into a puddle, disrupting Wolfbot’s sensors.
Wolfbot recalibrates and deploys a spider-drone to search shadows for Red.
Red escapes through a chain-link fence hole, heading to the city’s wooded outskirts.
Wolfbot transmits a coded order for Cybershark Gang patrols to converge on Red’s last known location.
Red enters Grandma’s apartment with the nanomedicine case.
Red notices Grandma’s behavior is odd; the figure beckons her closer with unnatural movements and speech.
Red questions the Doppelgänger, flicks on a bedside scanner, and challenges its authenticity.
Red throws a disruptor pellet at the hologram, exposing a transmitter hidden in the pillow.
Red crushes the transmitter, realizing Wolfbot’s trap nearly succeeded.
Red darts behind a crash cart, clutching the nanomedicine case as Wolfbot scans the corridor with infrared sensors.
Wolfbot, glitching and malfunctioning, orders Red to drop the package and initiates error protocol.
Final Push: Red throws a sonic jammer, disrupting Wolfbot, and locks herself in the medbay via biometric lock.
Wolfbot hacks the medbay door, forcing it open as Red barricades it from inside with a supply crate.
Red vaults over crates as the Cybershark Gang Leader and two members block her escape.
The Gang Leader threatens Red, demanding the nanomedicine vial; Red refuses and taunts him.
A gang member grabs for Red; she escapes, hides the vial, and throws a flash pellet to blind them.
Red flees through a gap between fences, evading capture but forced onto a longer, riskier route to the colony.
